programme.desc: Reba is thrilled when Kyra moves back in with her, but is stunned when she catches her drinking. Brock confesses he let her have the occasional beer in the house and reluctantly agrees to go along with this new parenting plan.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba and Van call it quits on their real estate partnership; Barbra Jean auditions for TV.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Barbra Jean panics a pregnant Cheyenne by remarking that her baby may turn out to be a mini-Kyra. Reba decides its time she told Cheyenne that she was the mean sister, not Kyra.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: When Sophia sets Dorothy up on a blind date, Dorothy secretly falls for the seemingly simple man, claiming 'he's the greatest lover she ever had'. Meanwhile, Blanche and Rose join 'Be a Pal'.Guests: John Fiedler..

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: The girls' dates all cancel on them, leaving them to reflect on past experiences.Guests: Julio Iglesias..

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy wants some quality time with Sophia while Rose and Blanche start a storybook.Guests: Freddie Jackson..

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy has little success lining up talent for a ladies' auxiliary variety benefit show.Guests: Bob Hope..

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sophia meets a fight manager and buys a controlling interest in boxer 'Kid Pepe.'Guests: Chick Vennera..

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy and her 'best friend' from high school take their rivalry to the tennis court.Guests: Anne Francis..

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: Mike insists that no one but Axl fix the front door after he accidentally knocks it down. Frankie must sell a car within a week or be forced to wear a dog suit outside the lot.

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: In a frenzy to get the garbage out in time, Frankie accidentally hits Brick with a beer bottle leaving a scratch and leading to a social worker paying the Heck household a visit.

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: Frankie's dream of a perfect family Thanksgiving is ruined when Mr. Ehlert forces the staff to work on the holiday. Meanwhile, Frankie and Mike approve of Sue's first boyfriend.

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: Frankie observes what she thinks are the perfect siblings, and it becomes her mission in life to make her kids stop fighting with one another and interact as a loving family. Meanwhile, Mike contemplates firing Aunt Edie after she makes a costly mistake.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Kyra has been secretly taping Van and posting the video on YouTube.com for the entire world to see and mock. Reba advises Brock to make a grand romantic gesture to save his marriage to Barbra Jean.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Barbra Jean convinces a reluctant Reba to coax the truth out of Kelly. Barbra Jean suspects that Kelly was brought in by management to be her successor. Meanwhile, Cheyenne and Van break some bad news to Brock.Guests: Kelly Clarkson..

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba learns that Brock has been secretly living in the garage for several days so he can spend time apart from Barbra Jean, who thinks he is on a business trip. Brock confesses that he doesn't know how to mend things with his wife.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba is thrilled when she finds the perfect first home for Cheyenne and Van to buy. Meanwhile, not wanting the public to know they have separated, Barbra Jean asks Brock to pretend they are still happily married.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Kyra tells Reba and Brock that she is postponing college to go on tour with her band. When Reba puts her foot down and tells Kyra she won't allow her to make this mistake, Kyra moves out. Meanwhile, Cheyenne and Van can't agree on decorating the house.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Cheyenne and Van confirm Reba's worst nightmare: they feel Reba is becoming their own version of Barbra Jean by her unannounced visits to their new house.
